localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
The extra scoop of fries they add to the bottom of your bag at Five Guys has to be a top 5 all-time fast food invention

Every single time I know they’re in there but they somehow taste 17% better than the ones in the container b/c it feels like a bonus
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
他们在五个人的袋底多加了一勺薯条，这一定是有史以来排名前五的快餐发明。

每次我知道它们在里面，但不知何故，它们的味道比容器B/C里的好17%，这感觉就像是额外的奖励

他們在五個人的袋底多加了一勺薯條，這一定是有史以來排名前五的快餐發明。

每次我知道它們在裏面，但不知何故，它們的味道比容器B/C裏的好17%，這感覺就像是額外的獎勵

previous.excerpt: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
previous.title: Online teambuilding by Flinkit! - Web-hosted team building games for small and large companies

localize.description: Flinkit！为远程团队提供趣味性和创造性的合作机会，增强团队合作和信任。团队可以在竞争的同时，按照精心设计的故事情节解决高度可视化的任务和谜语。
localize.tagline: 适用于小型和大型公司的网络托管团队建设游戏。

localize.description: Flinkit！爲遠程團隊提供趣味性和創造性的合作機會，增強團隊合作和信任。團隊可以在競爭的同時，按照精心設計的故事情節解決高度可視化的任務和謎語。
localize.tagline: 適用於小型和大型公司的網絡託管團隊建設遊戲。

next.excerpt: 👋 Clubhouse has very unique image shape and we decided to make a tool for creating colorful borders. This is a weekend project which we made together with @muratcorlu 🚀 It is open source don't worry about your privacy!
next.title: Chpic - Create a colorful ring for your profile picture on Clubhouse

localize.description: 👋 会所有非常独特的图像形状，我们决定做一个工具来创建多彩的边框。这是我们和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一个周末项目，它是开源的，不用担心你的隐私。
localize.tagline: 在Clubhouse上为你的个人档案图片设计一个彩色的戒指。

localize.description: 👋 會所有非常獨特的圖像形狀，我們決定做一個工具來創建多彩的邊框。這是我們和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一個週末項目，它是開源的，不用擔心你的隱私。
localize.tagline: 在Clubhouse上爲你的個人檔案圖片設計一個彩色的戒指。
